message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you this amazing product! It's a unique and valuable item that I think you'll really love. I'm willing to sell it to you for $150.
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking of making an offer of $120. Would you be willing to sell it to me for that price?
I appreciate your interest in the product, Bob! However, $120 is a bit lower than I was hoping for. I'm willing to meet you halfway and sell it to you for $140.
I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, Alice. However, I'm still a bit hesitant to go up to $140. Would you be willing to sell it to me for $130?

I understand you're trying to get a good deal, Bob, but I'm not willing to go any lower than $140. I'm willing to throw in a small discount, so I'll meet you at $137.50. Is that something you'd be interested in?
I appreciate the discount, Alice, but I'm still not comfortable going up to $137.50. Would you be willing to sell it to me for $135?
I'm not willing to go any lower than $137.50, Bob. I'm starting to think we're close to a deal, though. I'll meet you at $136.50. That's the best I can do.
I appreciate your willingness to compromise, Alice, but I'm still not comfortable going up to $136.50. Would you be willing to sell it to me for $135.50?
